name: ESNAA Copper Smelter
company_mentions: ESNAA Copper Non-Ferrous Metal Casting L.L.C.

sources.notes: Next-generation copper and precious-metals refining complex in designated industrial zone, Dubai. Under development.

Confirmed as real planned facility. Core business: next-gen copper smelter with integrated precious metals capability. Developer: AMA Group UAE. Strategic alignment: UAE VISION 2031, OPERATION 300BN. Sustainability: ISO 14001/45001 standards, emission control, sulfur capture, zero-liquid discharge, waste-heat recovery. Part of UAE's strategy to diversify economy and build high-value manufacturing.

verification.notes: Confirmed real project by AMA Group UAE, aligned with UAE VISION 2031 and OPERATION 300BN. World-class facility with ISO 14001/45001 standards planned.
